name: Untitled Zombie Game (r3sgame)
description:
Untitled Zombie Game is a zombie game with a twist: You control the zombies! Go through many different levels as you attempt to infect the entirety of humanity! Be careful, however, as the humans have weapons of their own...

How to Play

Infect every human in each level by touching them. They will then turn into a zombie, allowing you to control them.

Touching a bullet fired by a human or running into a laser will kill you, forcing you to restart the level.

Controls

W and S keys: Move forward and backward respectively.

Your character will automatically face whichever direction your cursor is in.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
